tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE power_outages (
    outage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outage_type STRING,
    outage_location STRING,
    outage_start_time TIMESTAMP,
    outage_duration INTERVAL,
    affected_customers INT
)

CREATE TABLE power_outages (
    outage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    cause VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE PowerOutages (
   outage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   outage_time TIMESTAMP,
   location VARCHAR(255),
   status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE GridDisturbances (
   disturbance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   disturbance_time TIMESTAMP,
   location VARCHAR(255),
   type VARCHAR(50),
   severity VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE RestorationEfforts (
   restoration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   outage_id INT,
   start_time TIMESTAMP,
   end_time TIMESTAMP,
   status VARCHAR(50),
   feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PowerOutages (
    outage_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    duration INTERVAL,
    affected_area VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RestorationLog (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    outage_id INT REFERENCES PowerOutages(outage_id),
    team_id INT REFERENCES ResponseTeams(team_id),
    action_taken TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE power_outages (
    outage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    outage_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE grid_disturbances (
    disturbance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE outage_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outage_id INT,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_time TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE restoration_efforts (
    effort_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outage_id INT,
    technician_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    installation_date DATE
)
